code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./course.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Courses(_ref){let{increment,decrement}=_ref;const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:4000/courses').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setCourses(data.courses);}).catch(error=>console.error('There was an error fetching the courses:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"start",children:"Courses We offer :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"last",children:courses.map((course,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[course,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn-style",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"add",onClick:increment,children:"add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"remove",onClick:decrement,children:"remove"})]})]},index))})]})});}
